contextId.information: This is a polite way of referring to when a person dies. AT: "until we die" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])

This refers to the act of sexual union as if it were only the bed of a married couple. AT: "Let husbands and wives honor their marriage relationship to one another and not sleep with other people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: Let the marriage bed be pure
